description: Schengen Visa (Type C) for tourism in Belgium. Allows stay up to 90 days in a 180-day period.

meta.passport_validity: At least 3 months beyond departure from Schengen area

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Valid for at least 3 months after intended departure. Must have 2 blank pages. Issued within last 10 years.

documents.title: Visa Application Form
documents.description: Completed and signed application form from Visa On Web (VOW).

documents.title: Two Recent Photographs
documents.description: 35x45mm, white background, taken within last 6 months.

documents.title: Travel Medical Insurance
documents.description: Minimum coverage of 30,000 EUR for medical costs and repatriation. Valid for entire Schengen area.

documents.title: Travel Itinerary
documents.description: Round trip flight reservation and detailed travel plan.

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Hotel bookings for entire stay or invitation letter (Bijlage 3bis / Annexe 3bis) if staying with friends/family.

documents.title: Proof of Financial Means
documents.description: Bank statements (last 3 months), ITR (last 3 years), payslips (last 3 months).

documents.title: Proof of Employment/Student Status
documents.description: Leave letter from employer/school, student ID, or business registration if self-employed.

documents.title: Cover Letter
documents.description: Explaining purpose of visit, dates, and itinerary.

steps_flow.title: Complete Online Application
steps_flow.description: Fill out the visa application form on the 'Visa On Web' portal.

steps_flow.title: Book VFS Appointment
steps_flow.description: Schedule an appointment at a VFS Global center in India.

steps_flow.title: Prepare Documents
steps_flow.description: Gather all required documents, including insurance and flight reservations.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Visit VFS center to submit documents and provide biometrics (fingerprints & photo).

steps_flow.title: Track & Collect
steps_flow.description: Track status online. Processing takes ~15 days. Collect passport from VFS or via courier.
